opinions.opinion: Mixed but cautiously optimistic outlook from experts. Predicted growth of 2.6% for 2026 globally, amid geopolitical risks.
AI expected to boost research in biomedicine but may have 'toxic side effects'.
Increased discussion expected about healthcare funding amidst rising costs and drug distribution concerns.
Calls for reflection and resolve as nations step back from environmental goals.
Ongoing uncertainty in economic and geopolitical sectors, highlighting the need for resilient portfolios.
